data.name: First 90 Days as a PM by Adobe Group Product Manager
data.summary:
Main Takeaways:
- Find their north star
- Master the numbers
- Manage their constraints
data.speakers:
Suresh Sivaprakasam

Suresh has 20+ years of experience leading Product, Strategy, and Operations. His expertise includes SaaS & Subscriptions, Product Management, Business Operations, Program Management, and Analytics.
